author: √çtalo Waxman
relationship: Worked together on the same team
content: We worked on some projects together and I can say that effective communication and commitment are Danilo's hallmark characteristics. In a world where designers and developers speak different languages, his commitment and engagement made that magic happen. I can say that he masters Android development and Software Engineering like few others I have worked with. It was an immense pleasure and he is one of the coolest people I have had the opportunity to work with so far. A distinguished guy, patient, attentive, and with a lot of empathy.

author: Thiago Neves
content: I was led by Danilo in several projects. He is an excellent professional. Intelligent, dedicated, he has enormous ease in learning new technologies, and an incredible ability to understand and explain demands, besides being proactive.

author: Luciano Silva
relationship: Worked together on the same team
content: Danilo is the most brilliant architect / developer I have ever met. Before mobility became what it is today, he was the first person I saw developing for PDAs, which at the time were quite archaic and limited. Today I don't know anyone who understands more about software development for mobile devices than him. I have always learned a lot from Danilo.

author: Mauricio Rolim
content: First-level developer, total mastery of Android, I definitely recommend him!

author: Joao Bosco Stanzione
content: Danilo is an excellent software architect and developer, in addition to having the exceptional ability to share his high level of knowledge.

author: Marcel Macedo
content: He is an extremely committed, flexible, and friendly professional. He is an excellent leader, in addition to having great knowledge in infrastructure, development, and support.
